attributes.action: horse-whip Charlie from Big Brother on exiting the house.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: She has a big mouth, is annoying and disrespectful and a bad role-model for young people all over the world.  A suitable punishment for her behaviour should be some sort of public humiliation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
